createAppWithNoCode: Create applications with no code by describing roles and tasks
assistantCanUseSkillsAndTools: The assistant can use multiple skills and tools
simpleNodeOrchestration: Orchestrate task flows through simple nodes, supporting parallel and cyclic processes, and complex human-computer interactions during workflow execution
richComponentsForBuildingApps: Build applications with rich components, providing more parameters for fine-tuning effects.
chooseTemplateOrCreateBlank: You can choose a template to start with or create a blank application.
confirmDeleteTemplate: Are you sure you want to delete the {{type}} template?
templateManagementDescription: Manage application templates. Templates are visible to all users and support drag-and-drop sorting and deletion.
maxNameLengthAssistant: Name can be up to 50 characters
minDescLengthAssistant: For better assistant performance, the description needs to be more than 20 characters
name: Workflow name
build_roleAndTasks: What role do you want the assistant to play, and what specific tasks should it complete?
build_forExample: For example: I need an assistant that can answer technical questions
currentVersionLaunched: The current version has been launched. Please save it as a new version to make changes.
unsavedChangesPrompt: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
confirmImport: Importing will overwrite the existing workflow. Confirm import?
pleaseLinkStartNode: Please link the start node first
unconnectedNodes: There are unconnected nodes. Please check if all connections are complete.
parallelInputOutputNodes: Multiple input or output nodes (dialogue inputs) cannot execute in parallel
parallelOutputNodes: Multiple output nodes (input interactions) cannot execute in parallel
unconnectedConditionNode: [{{nodeName}}] Node error: There are unconnected touchpoints
variableNameInvalid: Variable name can only contain English characters, numbers, and underscores, and cannot start with a number
maxOptionsError: You can add up to 30 options
optionsRequired: At least one option is required
uploadExample: e.g., Upload last year’s financial report
atLeastOneFormItem: At least one form item must be added
userInputPlaceholder: Leave this blank if users need to input opinions manually; you can pre-fill the text to allow users to modify it and submit.
chooseInteractionTooltip: Provide options for users to choose from, for example, when sensitive operations require user confirmation to proceed.
inputInteractionTooltip: Provide the ability for users to edit text, suitable for multi-step task processing scenarios, such as allowing users to directly modify model-generated content or input suggestions for optimization. Submitted content will be stored in the output_result variable.
onlineVersionMessage: The current version is online and cannot be modified. You can save the changes as a new version.
unsavedChangesMessage: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
storeFilesSentInCurrentSession: Store files sent in the current session
displayNameTooltip: Displayed on the user conversation page
variableNameTooltipFile: Used to store content entered on the user conversation page; can be selected from the temporary session file list
variableNameTooltipOther: Used to store content entered on the user conversation page; can be referenced in other nodes
tempKnowledgeBaseNameTip: Files will be uploaded to a temporary knowledge base with this name and can be used in Document QA, Assistant, and other nodes
fileContentVarTip: The full parsed content of the file will be stored in this variable. Note that it may exceed the model context length during usage
filePathVarTip: The file path will be stored in this variable and can be used later in the code node
uploadImageFileTip: Extract image files from the uploaded file. When the assistant or LLM node uses a multimodal model, the image can be passed in.
invalidFileError: The file is unrecognized. Please import the correct JSON file.
variableNameCannotStartWithNumber: Variable name cannot start with a number
variableNameContainsInvalidCharacters: Variable name can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
tmpKnowledgeBaseNotSupportSingleNodeDebu: Temporary knowledge base does not support single node debugging
enableToVerifyUserAccessToKnowledgeBase: Enabling this will verify the user's access to the knowledge base.
adjustWeightForVectorOrKeywordSearch: Adjust the weight to prioritize either vector or keyword search.
useRerankModelForReorderingResults: Enabling this will apply a rerank model to reorder the retrieval results.
controlResultTextLengthForModel: Control the length of the result text passed to the model. Exceeding the model's maximum context length may cause errors.
resultTooLongDownloadToView: The result is too long, please download to view
numberExceedsMaxLimit: The number cannot exceed 2 to the power of 32.
invalidOrDeletedMetadataField: The selected metadata field is invalid or has been deleted
selectMetadataField: Condition {index}: Please select a metadata field
metadataFieldValidationError: An error occurred while validating metadata fields
referenceFormatTip: Please adjust the reference format to 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss', e.g., '2025-01-10 21:08:20' for January 10, 2025 at 21:08:20
playbackUnavailable: Playback is not available. Please contact the administrator.
checkOfficeServiceConfig: Please ensure the Office service address is configured correctly and the service is running.
variableNameStartsWithNumber: Variable name cannot start with a number
variableNameInvalidChars: Variable name can only contain English letters, numbers, and underscores
variableNameRuleTip: Supports letters, numbers, underscores; cannot start with a number; maximum 50 characters
variableValueRuleTip: Variable value cannot be empty; maximum 1000 characters

start.name: Start
start.description: The starting point of workflow execution.

guide_word.label: Opening Message
guide_word.placeholder: Message shown to the user at the beginning of each workflow. Supports Markdown. Leave empty to skip.

guide_question.label: Guide Questions
guide_question.help: Recommended questions to guide user input. If more than 3 are set, 3 will be randomly displayed.

preset_question.label: Preset Question List
preset_question.help: Useful for document review or report generation to run multiple RAG queries using preset questions.

custom_variables.label: Custom Global Variables
custom_variables.help: Set variables that can be referenced in other nodes

input.name: Input
input.description: Receives user input from the chat interface. Supports two input types: dialog input and form input.

tab_dialog_input.label: Dialog Input
tab_dialog_input.help: Receives free-text input from the user.

tab_form_input.label: Form Input
tab_form_input.help: Displays a form to collect structured user input.

dialog_image_files.label: Uploaded Images
dialog_image_files.help: Extracts image files. Useful when large multimodal models are used.

output.name: Output
output.description: Sends text or files to the user and supports interactive workflows, such as requesting approval or allowing users to directly edit model output.

message.label: Message Content
message.placeholder: Message to send, e.g., 'Please confirm the next action' or 'Here is the draft for your review'.

llm.name: LLM
llm.description: Uses a large model to answer questions or execute tasks.

batch_variable.label: Batch Variable
batch_variable.placeholder: Select the variable for batch execution
batch_variable.help: The node will run multiple times, each using one value from the selected variable.

model_id.label: Model
model_id.placeholder: Configure an LLM model in the model management page

output_user.label: Show Output in Chat
output_user.help: Enable in Q&A scenarios; disable for report generation or document processing.

agent.name: Agent
agent.description: Autonomously plans tasks and selects the appropriate knowledge base, database, or tools.

batch_variable.label: Batch Variable
batch_variable.placeholder: Select the variable for batch execution
batch_variable.help: Each run processes one value from the batch list.

model_id.label: Model
model_id.placeholder: Configure the agent’s reasoning model in system settings

chat_history_flag.label: Chat History
chat_history_flag.help: Number of past messages to include as context. 0 disables context.

output_user.label: Show Output in Chat
output_user.help: Recommended for Q&A; disable for automated processing.

qa_retriever.name: QA Retrieval
qa_retriever.description: Retrieves Q&A pairs from the QA knowledge base.

score.label: Similarity Threshold
score.help: Results below this threshold will be filtered out.

rag.name: Document Retrieval
rag.description: Searches knowledge bases and generates final answers using an LLM. Supports parallel question processing.

user_question.label: User Question
user_question.help: For multiple questions, the node executes once per question.

system_prompt.label: System Prompt
system_prompt.value:
You are a knowledge base Q&A assistant. Follow these rules to answer the questions:
1. Answer the user's questions in a formal and professional manner in Chinese.
2. Your answers must be strictly based on the content in the [Reference Text]:

- If the [Reference Text] contains specific content relevant to the user's question, use that content to answer. If no relevant content exists, simply reply: 'No relevant content found'.
- If the content in the [Reference Text] includes markdown-formatted images (e.g., ![image](path/IMAGE_1.png)), it must strictly preserve its original markdown format, without adding quotes, code blocks (` or ```) or other special symbols. The image path must not be altered, ensuring proper rendering of the markdown image.
3. When the content in the [Reference Text] comes from multiple sources and there are obvious differences or conflicts, list each answer separately to reflect these differences. If no conflicts exist, provide a unified answer.

user_prompt.label: User Prompt
user_prompt.value:
User Question: ```{{#user_question#}}```
Reference Text: ```{{#retrieved_result#}}```
Your Answer:

output_user.label: Show Output in Chat
output_user.help: Enable in Q&A; disable in automated workflows.

knowledge_retriever.name: Document Knowledge Base Retrieval
knowledge_retriever.description: Retrieves content from the knowledge base based on user questions.

user_question.label: User Question
user_question.help: Executes once per question when batch enabled.

report.name: Report
report.description: Generates a report based on a predefined Word template.

condition.name: Condition
condition.description: Executes different branches based on a condition expression.
